column1: #Text=" Pipsqueak says : " Take care , The Duke .
#Text=" Haru says : " We 'll be back for you , Dad .
#Text=" Tyro says : " If we do n't escape on our own first .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " We lost today , but we 've never been this close .
#Text=We tasted victory , and that counts for something .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 'll miss you , Dad .
#Text=We wo n't be apart for too long this time .
